name: HybridConnectionManager Service Running
description: Rule to detect the Hybrid Connection Manager service running on an endpoint.
false_positives: Legitimate use of Hybrid Connection Manager via Azure function apps.
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-ServiceBus\-Client AND event.code:(40300 OR 40301 OR 40302) AND \*.keyword:(/.*[Hh][Yy][Bb][Rr][Ii][Dd][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Bb]\:\/\/.*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Bb][Uu][Ss]\.[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Hh][Yy][Bb][Rr][Ii][Dd][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-ServiceBus\-Client AND event.code:(40300 OR 40301 OR 40302) AND \*.keyword:(*HybridConnection* OR *sb\:\/\/* OR *servicebus.windows.net* OR *HybridConnectionManage*))`
